name: Stack the Odds (Incredibold Studio, Gabnixe, GoodOlPing, FelixGCliche)
name_original: Stack the Odds (Incredibold Studio, Gabnixe, GoodOlPing, FelixGCliche)
description:
The "I have a nothing to do while my friend takes 2h playing their turn in D&D so I try to make a tower of dices while waiting" simulator is now here!

Stack the Odds is a game where you score by building the highest tower made out of dice. Use D6, D8, D12, D20 randomly given to you to try to build your Dice Tower Of Doom! Before, you can use them, they will rolled and the result will change their size. Try to stack a rolled 20 D20 on a rolled 1 D6, I dare you.

Made for GMTK 2022 with the theme : Roll of the Dice

Controls
W/S : Zoom in / Zoom out
A/D : Pan camera around play area;
Mouse : Drag and drop dice
